comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Please keep in mind that we are looking for payout in $ on this one and not necessarily your multiplier. Almost all of you send me a multiplier but just to be clear whoever holds the highest $ win at the end with a maximum bet of $1 is the winner.

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Congratulations to our winners!1st with a $99 hit - Today BTC $ 56666!2nd with a $33 hit - kumiskura!Thank you all for taking part in the first edition of this one, if you have any feedback/suggestions on ways to improve - my inbox is open!I'll catch you in the next one
